entries.source:
Chat Edit: 'The application must exclusively use shadcn/ui for all components. No other component libraries are permitted. If a necessary component is not available in shadcn/ui, it must be custom-built using the existing shadcn/ui primitives.

Custom-built components must be placed in a dedicated custom directory, located at the same level as the shadcn/ui ui directory.

The primary feature is to display sales data, securely retrieved via a GET request from the /vendas JSON endpoint, in a clear table format. The table must include the following columns: Sale Date, Customer Name, Product Name, Quantity, Unit Value, and Total Value.

As an optional bonus, include a search field to filter the displayed sales by Customer Name or Product Name.

This application serves to modernize the viewing of daily sales summaries, replacing the manual decryption of an old, end-of-day .dat text file'
